verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* king will \w be|strong="H1732"\w* glad \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* strength, O Lord; how great will \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* delight \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* salvation!

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H8055"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heart's desire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not kept back \w the|strong="H3068"\w* request \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lips. (Selah.)

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* go before \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* blessings \w of|strong="H3820"\w* good things: \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3820"\w* fair gold \w on|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* head.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H7896"\w* request \w to|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* life, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* gave \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7218"\w* \w him|strong="H7896"\w*, long life \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7218"\w* ever.

\w His|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w is|strong="H3117"\w* great \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* salvation: honour \w and|strong="H3117"\w* authority \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* made \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* blessing \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever: \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* given \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* face.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king \w has|strong="H3588"\w* faith \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mercy \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Most|strong="H1293"\w* High \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1293"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* moved.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* search \w for|strong="H3588"\w* all \w your|strong="H3068"\w* haters; \w your|strong="H3068"\w* right hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* hard \w on|strong="H3068"\w* all \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* against \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* flaming oven before \w you|strong="H3605"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H4672"\w* end \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* burned \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire.

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* fruit \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H0398"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* seed \w from|strong="H6440"\w* among \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H2233"\w* thoughts \w were|strong="H1121"\w* bitter against \w you|strong="H0776"\w*: \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* an evil design \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H2233"\w* minds, which \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* able \w to|strong="H0776"\w* put \w into|strong="H0776"\w* effect.

\w Their|strong="H5921"\w* backs \w will|strong="H4209"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H2803"\w* ready \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cords \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w bow|strong="H5186"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* faces.

\w Be|strong="H3588"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, O Lord, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* strength; \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* songs \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H3559"\w*.
